name: Stickman Rope Hero 2
description:
*New map.
*Reworked battle system.
*More weapons, more cars, more secrets.
*New AI system.
*Reworked skills tree.
New adventures of stickman ropehero in the dangerous city. More evil clones. More different weapons. More cars. More of everything.
Again your appear among of evil replicants. Destroy your enemies with all the explosive arsenal at your disposal. Get hot cars and run over other stickmans.
Find friendly copies who will give you tasks and rewards.
Participate in the stickman war now!
